goals__remit:
EFHOH is a non-profit European non-governmental organization consisting of/for hard of hearing and late deafened people, parent organizations and professional organizations at a European level in dialogue with the European Union, the Members of the European Parliament, and other European authorities. 
 
The main focus is subtitling, hearing loops, and hearing loss rehabilitation. We aim to facilitate collaborations between our members and raise awareness of hearing loss and its impact on the general public. 
 
Our aim is a Europe where hard of hearing people can live without barriers, and have the opportunity to participate on all levels in society. 
 
 
﻿
